programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Using inmates to turn troubled teens away from a life of crime; inmates express their regrets.

programme.title: Lockup: San Antonio: Extended Stay
programme.desc: In San Antonio, Texas, rival gangs shed blood in a power struggle to control a wide range of criminal activity including drugs, prostitution and human trafficking; this turf war has expanded from the streets to inside the walls of Bexar County Jail.

programme.title: Lockup: San Antonio: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Gang members disrupt a housing unit, and when inmates flood their cells, the Special Emergency Response Team, or SERT, takes action, placing one inmate in special restraints; a female inmate poses a dangerous threat to staff.

programme.title: Lockup: San Antonio: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A two-on-one assault leaves an inmate bloodied and injured, but getting to the bottom of this fight requires some digging; a popular restaurateur, accused of capitol murder, fights for his freedom.

programme.title: Lockup: San Antonio: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate causes chaos in his housing unit after accusing staff of abusing him, and he explodes in anger when a valued possession is taken from his cell; accused of a vicious vigilante-style murder, another inmate says jail has saved his own life.

programme.title: Lockup: San Antonio: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Former gang members attempt to leave deadly rivalries behind, then the men in another housing unit deal with a completely different set of issues; a surprise contraband raid turns one housing unit upside down.

programme.title: Lockup: San Antonio: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate with an influential family in one gang, joins its arch rival; a female inmate who has ties to both gangs finds her mail has jail officials concerned.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A former weatherman claiming to be an undercover spy infiltrates Washington's intelligence circles where he collects millions with his tales of running a top-secret national security operation for the CIA.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: In sun-drenched San Diego, entrepreneur and real estate developer Gina Champion-Cain lures in investors with a glamorous, beachy image and promises of sky-high returns on short-term liquor license loans.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a possible gang beating, but the surveillance cameras don't catch anything; a wounded warrior faces a new battle when he and his girlfriend both get arrested.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One inmate contends that a law could put him away forever; an inmate sentenced to life without parole prays that a new law will set him free.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A family man gets a decade in jail for manufacturing weapons; a meth addict gives up a prized possession; jail introduces both of these men to a cowboy, some wild horses and the opportunity of a lifetime.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A new inmate fears the worst; a gang member asks for help to change his life, but first he must convince a staff member with plenty of his own experience on the inside.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Just weeks away from completing his sentence, an inmate is accused of murdering his cellie; a large woman with a personality to match loses everything to meth; an inmate causes a disturbance on the jail's transfer bus.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One alleged gang leader is charged with assault shortly after his arrest and now his arch-rival is has been booked into the jail as well; an admitted identity thief and meth addict clings to hope for a better life.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: At the Penitentiary of New Mexico, officers are outnumbered and the inmates are unpredictable, especially in Level 6, the maximum-security facility; it's where the deputy warden says "the worst of the worst" are housed.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A low-level offender increases his sentence from 18 months to 16-and-a-half years after three separate counts of aggravated battery on an officer; the same inmate was banned from even non-contact visits after an affair with a prison staff nurse.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The Penitentiary of New Mexico houses both low level and max-security inmates; Level 6 inmates like Chris Shiverdecker, who has a Macgyver-like prison reputation, are still eligible for hearings that could change custody level and security status.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a possible gang beating, but the surveillance cameras don't catch anything; a wounded warrior faces a new battle when he and his girlfriend both get arrested.

programme.title: Lockup: Sacramento: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One inmate contends that a law could put him away forever; an inmate sentenced to life without parole prays that a new law will set him free.
